quote.quotepara:
Missing attributes in the payloads for the EIQuote and EIEvent serveice that are
used to support non-repudiation.

Key: ENERGYINTEROP-427 URL: http://tools.oasis-open.org/issues/browse/ENERGYINTEROP-427 Project: OASIS Energy Interoperation TC Issue Type: Bug Affects Versions: wd22 Reporter: Ed Koch Assignee: Ed Koch Fix For: wd25

Need to add an attribute to the EICreatedXXX and EICanceledXXX payloads for the
EIQuote and EIEvent services that can be used for non-repudiation. This
attribute can contain a unique signature that can be used to validate that the
VEN recived the Quote or Event information. Note that this is also required for
compatibility to OpenADR 1.0.
